plot: For the past three and a half years, Kevin Spenst has written a short story every day. On the day of his 1000th story he set off on his bike to do a 50 stop reading tour of the city...in one day.
title: One Thousand Stories
plot_es: For the past three and a half years, Kevin Spenst has written a short story every day. On the day of his 1000th story he set off on his bike to do a 50 stop reading tour of the city...in one day.
plot_en: For the past three and a half years, Kevin Spenst has written a short story every day. On the day of his 1000th story he set off on his bike to do a 50 stop reading tour of the city...in one day.
